item.title: opencv 常用操作
item.author: zhangyuhu
item.description: unsigned char* 转换为 Mat类型 1 cv::Mat mmat = cv::Mat(stFrameInfo.nHeight, stFrameInfo.nWidth, CV_8UC1, stImageInfo.pBufAddr, 0); BYTE* 转换为 Mat类型 1 2 3 cv::Mat sMat = Mat(sFrameHead.iHeight, sFrameHead.iWidth, CV_8UC1);; int nLen = sMat.rows * sMat.cols * sMat.channels(); memcpy(sMat.data, m_pFrameBuffer, nLen); Mat转unsigned char* 1 unsigned char pdata= srcMat.data; // Mat => unsigned
